forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
